content: mini-rings of change preface this free mini pattern is the first 42 row of the 111 row rings of change pattern i have included the complete list of stitches that are used in the full pattern they are not all used in these first 42 row this mini version can be used as a baby blanket of over 40 /101cm if you use worsted weight or it can be used as a small doily if you use crochet thread the full rings of change pattern will be available in late 2014 i will help you with any questions if you contact me through ravelry pm as franknjim or in my ravelry group made of change notes & tips are placed throughout and at the bottom of the pattern for your assistance please familiarize yourself with them before starting your project * *- repeat instructions between asterisks as many times as indicated us crochet terminology used hook size j \ 6 00 mm - repeat within repeat repeat instructions between brackets as many times yarn aran/medium weight caron as indicated simply soft if the 1st four row of the pattern will not lay flat use a larger hook = combined stitches to be made in next stitch next chain or next group yardage needed 945yds / 864m beginning chain 1 does not count as a this pattern is written for a single stitch throughout color of yarn to be used the rainbow color changes are listed to the right of each row other longer starting chains will be number for your reference to place your specified as to what they represent own personal color changes when you see a colon used in this colors used in rainbow version neon pattern it represents a group of sts and chain to coral neon orange neon yellow neon be skipped together green blue mint grape & black i e r o y g b p & blk skip next st chain 1 & st or gauge row 1-4 = 4 25 / 10 7cm skip next treble_crochet single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet & double_crochet beg cluster chain 2 *yo insert hook into st to be worked yo draw through st yo draw through finished size - 40 /101cm 2 loops on hook* 2 times yo draw through all 3 loops on hook high resolution photos can be found cluster *yo insert hook into st to be worked yo here afghan by the skein photos can be draw through st yo draw through 2 loops on found here hook* 2 times yo draw through all 3 loops on hook page 2 of 8 mini-rings of change abbreviations & stitches used skip skip yo yarn over st s stitch es space space slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet edc extended double_crochet made w/extra loop on bottom treble_crochet treble_crochet dtr double treble_crochet beg cluster beginning 2 double_crochet cluster stitch instructions above cluster cluster made from 2 dctog in same stitch stitch instructions above v_stitch
